summary: An introvert teen befriends his new neighbor, and together the couple begin to explore the haunted house that his family has just purchased.
cast: Harrison Gilbertson|Liana Liberato|Jacki Weaver|Ione Skye|Brian Wimmer|Danielle C. Ryan|Ella Harris|Carl Hadra|Sebastian Michael Barr|Brooke Kelly|Maggie Scott|Jan Broberg|Aline Andrade|Jarrod Phillips|Kasia Kowalczyk|Kelly Noonan|DeVille Vannik|Vaughn Travis|Brenden Whitney
title: Haunt
